user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable, stylish, and well-fitting leggings that would accommodate my body shape and provide ease of movement.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable and stylish leggings that would fit my fuller figure. The key attributes that attracted me were the high waist design, the stretch fabric that moves with me, and the comfort features like the wide waistband and flatlock seams. The positive experience I had with the product led me to buy multiple pairs.

I needed a pair of leggings that would be suitable for workouts and provide tummy control. The description highlighted the soft fabric and supportive high waist, but I found the sizing to be an issue. My decision was influenced by the need for comfort during exercise, but I was disappointed with the fit.

I wanted a pair of leggings that were soft, comfortable, and fit well. The product description emphasized the cotton softness and the right fit, which aligned with my needs. The positive review confirmed my choice, leading to a satisfying purchase.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, well-fitting, and made from high-quality materials. I value items that can be worn daily and provide a flattering look, whether it's for casual wear or workouts. I appreciate designs that are cute and fun, especially those that reflect a sense of humor or fandom. Additionally, I tend to favor products that offer practical features, such as pockets or supportive designs, and I enjoy versatile clothing that can transition easily from one activity to another. On the other hand, I dislike items that run small or do not fit as expected, as well as those that lack comfort or quality. I am not fond of products that are overly complicated to use or that do not meet my expectations in terms of durability and value for money.
